Woodcraft of Chattanooga: August Classes
    thingshappening

    Woodcraft of Chattanooga: August Classes

    When: 2024-08-04 (Saturday)
    Time: Varies
    Venue: Woodcraft of Chattanooga
    Address: 5824 Brainerd Road Chattanooga, TN 37411
    Entrance Fee: Varies
    Event Website

    The sheer number of classes and events Woodcraft puts on is impressive! If you're just starting out in woodwork, want to learn a new technique or just want to socialize with likeminded people, I think you'll find what you're looking for below. Check the event website for more information on each class.


    Classes:
    August 1st: Join Thru Joinery: Haunched Tenons
    August 1st: Join Thru Joinery: Pocket Holes
    August 1st and 8th: Woodworking Fundamentals I
    August 1st: Intro to Turning
    August 2nd and 3rd: Woodworking Fundamentals II
    August 2nd: DATE NIGHT: TURNED SCOOPS
    August 3rd: Intro to Turning
    August 3rd: Pen Turning 101: The Basics
    August 4th: Spindle Turning 101: The Basics
    August 6th: Pen Turning 101: The Basics
    August 8th: Journey Thru Joinery: Sliding Dovetails
    August 8th: Journey Thru Joinery: Reinforced Butt Joints
    August 8th: Journey Thru Joinery: Castle Joint
    August 9th and 10th: Woodworking Fundamentals III
    August 10th and 11th: Bowl Turning 102: From Log to Bowl
    August 12th, 13th and 14th: Kitchen Cabinetmaking 201: Tall Linen Cabinet
    August 12th: Intro to Wood Burning
    August 13th: Pen Turning 102: Using Acrylics
    August 15th: Kitchen Cabinetmaking 202: Dovetailed Drawers II
    August 15th, 16th and 17th: Spindle Turning 104: Advanced Spindle Projects
    August 16th: Kitchen Cabinetmaking 203: Raised Panel Doors
    August 17th: Kitchen Cabinetmaking 204: Spraying Finishes
    August 17th: Sharpening Turning Tools
    August 20th and 27th: Pen Turning 103: Pouring and Turning Resin Pen Blanks
    August 22nd: Intro to Turning
    August 23rd, 23th, 30th and 31st: Fine Furniture 101: Casework Construction
    August 23rd: DATE NIGHT: PAIR OF TURNED PENS
    August 24th: Bowl Turning 103: Natural Edge Bowls August 25th: Artistic Turning 201: Three Corner Bowl
    August 29th: Sawdust Social: Campfire Roasting Fork

    If you like woodcraft and don't see anything on this list that interests you, I don't really know what to say. If you do partake, I hope it's a great time!
